description: This file is a shell script used for network self-healing and diagnostic testing, including ping tests, DNS resolution checks, and device reboot logic.

methods.name: getCorrectiveActionState
methods.description: Fetches the current corrective action state from system configuration.

methods.name: calcRandTimetoStartPing
methods.description: Calculates a random delay time before starting a ping test.

methods.name: resetRouter
methods.description: Triggers a device reboot by simulating a reset command.

methods.name: resetNeeded
methods.description: Handles reset logic based on process name, currently resets router if process is PING.

methods.name: runDNSPingTest
methods.description: Performs DNS resolution test by pinging a specified URL and takes corrective action if resolution fails.

methods.name: runPingTest
methods.description: Performs ping test to the default gateway and triggers reset if packet loss is detected.
